text: @jsolomonReports @CallingAstro424 @RoyCooperNC What is the real number of COVID-19 deaths in NC? 30% of total annual deaths are people 85+; another 30% are 75-85. CDC says of the 75-85+ group, 30% die of flu & 30% *with* COVID-19. Risk to anyone under 65 & healthy is tiny. About like driving to work.
